title: DustBuddie Universal Dust Shroud for Grinders (Cup Wheel), 7"
features: Vacuum shroud used in dust containment while grinding with angle grinders.
Made of clear polycarbonate for improved visibility and durability.
Removable front edge of shroud for grinding close to a wall or edge.
Complies with EPA regulations for point-of-origin dust containment when used with a Dustless Technologies D1606 HEPA Vacuum
description: The DustBuddie dust containment shroud fits most hand grinders including Makita, Bosch, Dewalt and more. It captures up to 99% of airborne particles for outstanding dust control that preserves air quality and protects workers from harmful silica dust, Hexavalent Chromium and silicosis caused from sawing, cutting and grinding concrete, stone, masonry, fiberglass and other construction materials. Meet OSHA guidelines for worker safety with the industryâ€™s best dustless grinding system.
